Voice of the All-Spirit.name: Voice of the All-Spirit
Voice of the All-Spirit.fullText:
Scion of the All-Spirit Attack 11Voice of the All-Spirit

Your attack resonates with the voice of the All-Spirit, rendering your foes prone for future attacks.

Encounter        Primal, Thunder, Weapon
Standard Action      Close burst 2

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude

Hit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target falls prone. The target is deafened and marked until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 44.
Voice of the All-Spirit.flavor: Your attack resonates with the voice of the All-Spirit, rendering your foes prone for future attacks.
Voice of the All-Spirit.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target falls prone. The target is deafened and marked until the end of your next turn.

Form of the All-Spirit.name: Form of the All-Spirit
Form of the All-Spirit.fullText:
Scion of the All-Spirit Attack 20Form of the All-Spirit

Your body becomes a miasma of primal spirits encompassing animal, plant, weather, and elemental aspects in equal parts. Your new form reaches out to your allies and strikes at your foes.

Daily        Polymorph, Primal
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You assume the guardian form of the All-Spirit until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses. In addition, you and each ally adjacent to you gain resist 5 to all damage.
Once during this encounter, you can use the All-Spirit Attack power while you are in this form.


All-Spirit Attack

Daily      Polymorph, Primal, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Requirement: The power Form of the All-Spirit must be active in order to use this power.

Effect: Before the attack, you teleport your speed.

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. Will

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn.

Miss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 79.
Form of the All-Spirit.flavor: Your body becomes a miasma of primal spirits encompassing animal, plant, weather, and elemental aspects in equal parts. Your new form reaches out to your allies and strikes at your foes.
Form of the All-Spirit.effect: Before the attack, you teleport your speed.

Form of the All-Spirit.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
Form of the All-Spirit.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

All-Spirit Step.name: All-Spirit Step
All-Spirit Step.fullText:
Scion of the All-Spirit Utility 12All-Spirit Step

The All-Spirit beckons to your enemies as you slip out of trouble.

Encounter        Primal, Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Effect: You mark each enemy adjacent to you and then teleport your speed. You must end this teleport adjacent to at least one enemy you marked with this power.


Published in Dragon Magazine 386, page(s) 44.
All-Spirit Step.flavor: The All-Spirit beckons to your enemies as you slip out of trouble.
All-Spirit Step.effect: You mark each enemy adjacent to you and then teleport your speed. You must end this teleport adjacent to at least one enemy you marked with this power.
